title: NOPD: One person shot to death in Milan neighborhood
content:
NEW ORLEANS -- Police are investigating a fatal shooting in the Milan neighborhood Thursday afternoon.
The incident happened around 5:30 p.m. in the 2200 block of Peniston Street.
Police said when they arrived, they found a man laying in the street with multiple gunshot wounds. He was pronounced dead at the scene.
No other details have been released.
Anyone with information on this shooting is asked to call Crimestoppers at (504) 822-1111.
